评论详情: The sweater has got a pretty color and even some detailing around the shoulders that I appreciate. But as for staying warm this is not going to work. It's too lightweight for what I had in mind. Will probably send it back to get something warmer. After talking with the wonderful customer service department I've decided to keep the sweater. Really wonderful working with a company that takes suggestions. Highly recommend them.
Poor quality material. Washed and worn first time and it has snags and tears.
I love this sweater! Only one thing I need to say is that it had some pulled threads. Instead of returning I pulled them through and secured them myself.
This has a wonderful, soft feel. Great color. Layers easily. True to size. Washes great no pilling.
This item is poorly made. It does not come close to the description advertised
Exactly what I was looking for. It is light weight but still cozy and love that it has pockets!
Sent to my grand daughter for Christmas.  She said, she loved it and it fit.

I love this sweater because it is light weight. I can’t wear sweaters and long sleeves because I overheat quickly (even in our New England winters.) It is soft, 3/4 length sleeves. Longer then your typical wrap around / cardigan. I’m 180lbs and a large fit great.
This is definitely one of my favorite closet items!
Quality is not great. Super thin and looks cheap.
Good for Fall/Spring. Too heavy for summer. Cute vibrant color (I purchased the orange one).
Will be purchasing another.
Says and pictures show its waffle knit and it’s nothing like that. Not true waffle knit. Also it’s completely see through. The design looks like fans that were sewn together very very poorly.

The material is thin..so more of a fall item. The color says dusty green but it’s more of a blue green color..but still pretty. Other reviews talk about the sleeves not being long enough so I sized up and they fit perfectly..another review said theirs was nice but would be better with pockets..mine did come with pockets. I would have liked it to be a bit thicker but other than that I don’t really have any complaints.
The cardigan is very lightweight. The fit is nice but the sleeves are only 3/4 in length.

I am disappointed with the fabric, I had purchased shirts made of the same material from the same company and the shirts are soft, this sweater is not. I was so happy with the shirts that I purchased three. I will not do the same for the sweater. Sweater runs large it’s probably best to size down one. The color was not the same as depicted in the photo. Overall, not happy with the quality and this purchase.

I absolutely love this. I can’t wear anything too heavy at work. This is perfect. It’s been my go to for the last week. Very comfortable, love that it’s already cuffed on the wrist, looks chic under a shorter leather jacket. Will be buying more!

评论概述: Extremely lightweight not very tight nite.
评论详情: I like the cut of the garment. but it's really lightweight.
It was like a house shaw/robe, but worse.. fabric was see-through, paper thin! I returned!

评论概述: Snags just by looking at it
评论详情: This sweater has a cute shape and would be good to wear with lots of outfits but it snags terribly. It’s gotten to the point where it’s embarrassing and not wearable. The material is just not worth it.

评论概述: I will buy again from this brand
评论详情: The quality is great. Nicer than I expected.

It is, as others have said, lightweight and not really a "sweater", I was prepared for that. I was NOT prepared for how easily it picks. I have tons of snags on this after one wear to my office job. I've trimmed a huge number of strings since then and it is now a wear at home only sweater.
Cheap, thin
It's a nice looking sweater, but it's very, very thin.

It’s perfect for around the house or when it’s a mild chilly day out side. Shipping was pretty quick. I am disappointed it’s not heavier … it’s kinda waffle like and perfect to even wear after a day of being by the pool or on the boat or even around the keys once the sun goes down . Material feels nice, I like that the sleeves don’t strangle me or feel to big and catch on things , it almost feels stretchy but that’s not the right word for it. More like giving/flexible  and comfy ! I’m going to keep it since it is cute , and I love the length and the cute cut it has at the bottom to give my  legs some show on the sides. 4-5 stars.
Seemed cheaply made for the money paid
just as expected. true to size. washed and dried well.

I love how it looks with a casual outfit, jeans, t-shirt, boots.  I went down a size or two because of it's overall extra room, and it fits me perfectly and will not be obtrusive for packing to go on vacations.

Ooh! I LOVE this thing! Soft and light material and easy to throw on a day when you just need that extra layer. Living in California near the mountains, it can look nice outside, but sometimes the cold wind sneaks up on you and you need a sweater during early Spring and early Fall. Definitely going to order a few more colors cause I wear the one I ordered a lot.
Wanted to love these, got 2 of them. But after washing the material feels weird. Would not buy again

Sane quality as Shein. I got this on sale here. I love it but it could've been cheap. It is attractive and I'll wear it out. Looks good. I got XXL I like things to give me more room these days I don't like things so fitted anymore. But XXL was perfect. If you wantorecroom size up.
It was thin, fit super small, and did not look like the picture. The shoulders? Really weird.
Very comfortable sweater, but it snags super easily. I already have a few picks and loose threads after two wears.
This sweater does not lay nicely on the body. It is like it wasn’t made correctly
This fabric is so thin and not very soft. It runs a bit large in size. I will be returning as it is not worth the money paid for this tissue paper sweater.
It’s so comfortable! Perfect for any occasion
I loved this so much! Very oversized and comfortable! Would deff size down but otherwise I’m obsessed!
Nice fit and soft
I have two of these, and I wear them a LOT! They are perfect weight for fall and winter—the waffle knit is light enough that you don’t get overheated inside. Oversized fit is comfy and flattering.
Comfortable, but not as professional looking. More of a weekend, relax at home sweater.

评论概述: Waffle knit not great in person
评论详情: The picture was cute so I got a neutral color. In person it looks like a giant kitchen towel. The material is very thin.
Comfortable and looks great!
This is perfect and fits like the picture
The material, color, & style are just what I was looking for.

评论概述: So comfy and perfect for travel!
评论详情: Love the soft material that breathes but also keep me warm. This is my perfect travel attire with loose pants and top. Love the color too! Will go with most anything.
I bought a grey sweater nearly a year ago. Loved it so much I bought two more. Very comfy and looks beautiful.

Like some oversized clothing, this item is not made for plus size folks. The way it drapes is not flattering if you have defined shoulders or hips - looks like a bag. Plus the fabric is very prone to snags. Overall can’t recommend.
So lightweight and see through. Gauzy. Not what I expected in terms of thickness or quality.

I'm not a tall lady, and I got an XL. The sleeves hit me at more like mid forearm but were way too tight like they should have been at the wrist. I sent this one back. Was scratchier favric than I would have liked as well.
I really liked the color of this sweater and that I can wear it for work or dress up jeans with it.
dont like

Not as thick as I was hoping, and it was shaped a little funky
Very unflattering fit. It looks like fishnet , not a nice woven pattern.
love the color and the fit and mostly the superb quality of the material and stitching. Hishly recommend to anyone looking to look classy while being cosy this fall season
Fabric is lightweight while still giving off the cozy fall vibe. Perfect for the warmer fall days. Sleeve length and overall length is great.

Cute but not warm. Thin material. The sleeves are more like 3/4 sleeves instead if what the picture shows. I would buy again. I'm 5'6, 160lbs, and got a medium bc I didn't want a super oversized look.
It has so many holes in it that it is useless. What a waste of money.
Soft but poor quality material with random threads hanging inside. Shank on first wash. Doesn’t seem true to size.
I wear to church and work. It can we used as an everyday over t shirt and jeans  True to size
Little disappointed is thin but will be fine for just a cool crisp evening out
It was fine

评论概述: Cheap thin itchy material not wearable
评论详情: I can’t think of a cheaper, more itchy less attractive material that catches on anything and everything straight out of its bag. This unwearable material is made up of tiny “waffle” and more gaps than anything else. A wast of metal money.
Thinner than it looks but nice
This item does not fit as stated. My XL was too small and fit like a medium. Arms are super short too

I’ve ordered cardigans from this brand before and love them. This was so thinly knitted it was completely see through. Looked more like a swim suit cover up. Not impressed with the quality at all compared to my past purchases.
This is 1 of the softest sweaters I've gotten in awhile.  It washed wonderfully dried on low and it has pockets. The color is beautiful. Light enough for early fall and the office AC wars.

评论概述: Works well for island nights and some days too!!
评论详情: I loved this sweater. I took it with me on a trip to Montego Bay Jamaica last week for a wedding and it matched my Matron of honor gown perfectly. It was light enough for the island evening and the quality is great.

评论概述: Thinner than expected, but love it
评论详情: I love how this sweater fits me, and I love the color. It’s a little thinner material than I expected for a sweater and not as soft as some other reviewers mentioned. Maybe it will soften up once I wash it. If it goes on sale again, I’ll probably buy other colors.
I had to separate the stitching to sleeves to make them a bit longer- it smells really bad after being washed.
This sweater is of beautiful quality. It fits perfect. I Love the softness. Material is just the right thickness. I got the color Black. I see many uses for this.

评论概述: Not Wine at all.. BRIGHT RED!
评论详情: Color isn’t even close to the “wine” color advertised. It’s like a bright fire engine red. Return.

评论概述: I wanted to love this cardigan.
评论详情: I debated for more than a week trying to decide whether I wanted to keep or return this cardigan, but ultimately sent it back. It fit like I think it was supposed to (sort of an odd shape though), the fabric was soft and the color was pretty, but I didn’t care for the way it hung on me. It wasn’t awful, but it didn’t do anything for me. The fabric was thin too. It looked like it would snag very easily and I just didn’t see myself really wearing it very often, so I sent it back.
I love the color and that it has pockets but truly the material is so thin and cheap; snagged instantly while removing it from the shrink wrap.

评论概述: Not at all what is pictured
评论详情: I would just save your money and move on with this one. Material and look is cheap. Not cute like in the picture. The sleeves didn’t even go to my wrists. The back was too long. I feel like even if the material was better, I would have loved it…but it’s thin and airy and cheap feeling at best. I didn’t even take the tags off. I’m donating it. I wear a size 4 or 6 so I bought the small according to the size chart. I’m 5’5” and between 145-150.
I love it. Very pretty and it's really soft
So soft and warm.  You can wear it with everything!! Quality is great.  I did put a little stitch in to hold the pockets in place....but other than that.... AMAZING
Just the right weight, and of course the pockets are the best bonus. It was a little big but not too. Wore it on my recent cruise.
I purchased a Small, Pink Cardigan to throw over a tank top and leggings as the weather cools down. This is super cozy and fits comfortably (I am 5'2", 125lbs).
Very comfy

Love the fit. It's a light sweater, but it should be great for late summer to fall transition. My only disappointment is that the color is off. I ordered the "wine" color which looks like a brownish brick red in the pictures, but is actually a bright red. I will wear it, and so I won't return it, but i was really disappointed that it wasn't the color pictured.
Very comfortable and warm but thin and breathable. I’ve worn this a few times and love it!
Very soft and fits well. Three stars cause this color looks nothing like the photo.
Good price, but the material is ‘cheap’ feeling and the brown tone is more khaki than brown. It does the job, as far as being a neutral cardigan that goes with a lot of different types of outfits.

评论概述: Obsessed, wear it all the time.
评论详情: This is my favorite sweater, probably of all time. I just bought a second one because it was on sale. It is perfect for all year round and can be worn with anything. Highly recommend.
Such a beautiful sweater. I bought the XL and love it. So soft and comfortable
Not think but not thin, comfortable, fabric is nice, not scratchy, no odor, cute with long sleeves.  Can't wait to wear in fall and winter here .
I am in love with this sweater. I love the color, the weight of it (lightweight) and how it feels and looks. Definitely worth the money for a quality sweater.
A little more red than I  was expecting.
Love this so much I ordered more. I am usually an XL and I ordered a large and it was perfect!
This is exactly what I was hoping it would be. I'm normally a med/lg but I ordered this is xl for an oversized fit and is perfect. Very comfortable material. I'm ordering two more.
I need more colors. I ordered a size up for a more relaxed look and it’s sooooo comfy! Love the color, excellent breath ability!
I love the soft and comfortable material of this sweater. It's oversized and has pockets which is great!
I love how soft the material is and it’s just perfect. I just love this item.
Great for a quick cover up.  Soft and light weight.
The color is pink.  Photo looked like a neutral pink but product is baby nursery pink.  Fabric is thinner and cheaper looking in person.  I am sending this item back.
This cardigan is by far the best one I’ve ever gotten before. Everything about it is perfect! Definitely worth the buy!

It's great quality, and it's so Boho/hippie stylish. I love the color (very true to picture), and it's a nice breathable knit that makes it a great Spring/Fall cardigan. Or that something extra chic in the winter if everything else you have is thermals.
Great fit. True to size. Light weight.
It’s super comfy, durable and even if I went a size up or down I would be fine. True to size.
